ygData.subject: RE: Tinkering should be like pottery
ygData.msgSnippet: It s all price vs. performance.  If tinkering was as easy to boost as pottery (which has to be the easiest trade skill in the game), then everything we d make
ygData.messageBody:
It's all price vs. performance. If tinkering was as easy to boost as
pottery (which has to be the easiest trade skill in the game), then
everything we'd make would have to be gimped to the level of our fireworks.

They won't make anything that easy unless it is near useless.

-----Original Message-----
From: ms277017@...

I keep hearing you guys say you spend 5000pp to get master, I am like
WHAAA???? my rogue has a 142 skill in pottery, and I can honestly say it
didnt cost me over 50pp to get. Thats how tinkering should be.
